item.title: Kanji of the Day: 寄
item.description:
寄

✍11

小5

draw near, stop in, bring near, gather, collect, send, forward

キ

よ.る　-よ.り　よ.せる

寄せる   (よせる)   —   to come near
寄付   (きふ)   —   contribution
年寄り   (としより)   —   old people
寄り   (より)   —   pushing back one's opponent while locked in close quarters
寄与   (きよ)   —   contribution
寄る   (よる)   —   to approach
押し寄せる   (おしよせる)   —   to advance on
寄贈   (きそう)   —   donation
立ち寄る   (たちよる)   —   to stop by
歩み寄る   (あゆみよる)   —   to step up
寄せ   (よせ)   —   last moves (in go, shogi, or chess)
歩み寄り   (あゆみより)   —   compromise
寄港   (きこう)   —   stopping at a port
寄り付く   (よりつく)   —   to approach
詰め寄る   (つめよる)   —   to draw near
寄稿   (きこう)   —   contribution (e.g., to newspaper)
寄り切る   (よりきる)   —   to force someone out of the ring
取り寄せる   (とりよせる)   —   to order
寄席   (よせ)   —   entertainment hall (for rakugo, manzai, magic, music, etc.)
持ち寄る   (もちよる)   —   to gather (bringing something)

This page was generated using kanjioftheday, written by Douglas Paul Perkins. Kanji lists came from the Ministry of Education. Example words are derived from a word frequency list by Alexandre Girardi. Dictionary information is taken from KANJIDIC2 and EDICT.
